mint(address,uint256).details: Only callable by authorized bridges within their limits

params.burningLimit: Burning limit to set (tokens per duration)
params.mintingLimit: Minting limit to set (tokens per duration)

burningCurrentLimitOf(address).notice: Returns the current available burning limit for a bridge

burningMaxLimitOf(address).notice: Returns the maximum burning limit for a bridge

mintingCurrentLimitOf(address).notice: Returns the current available minting limit for a bridge

mintingMaxLimitOf(address).notice: Returns the maximum minting limit for a bridge

setLimits(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Updates the limits of a bridge
